hotels.title: Shangri-La Hong Kong Harbourfront Break with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Stay in an unbeatable harbourfront location at Kowloon Shangri-La in Hong Kong, a five-star landmark hotel that boasts a prime spot along the waterfront of Victoria Harbour. When it comes to gastronomic delights, there's no need to search further than the walls of your hotel thanks to four exquisite dining options onsite, including the Michelin-starred Shang Palace, serving a mouthwatering range of Cantonese dishes and equipped with a dedicated wine cellar and a 20-seat grand private dining room. If you're on the go, stop by Baked by Shangri-La for homemade bread and pastries. For a tipple or two, the Lobby Lounge is the perfect spot to relax under crystal chandeliers while live music and an extensive cocktail menu will keep you entertained. There's always something to do in Kowloon. Whether you're keen to explore the Hong Kong Museum of History, go shopping, laze under a tree at the city park or peruse the stalls at the Temple Street Night Market, the hotel is perfectly placed to tick off all the must-see and must-dos on your list.
